body: Do you know Ghana Time?: "Jokes abound about lateness – GMT stands for Ghana Man Time – and there is an assumption that nothing will ever start on time. And yet sometimes I wonder whether things don’t start on time because people are late, or because the attendees know that it won’t start on time."

And yet sometimes I wonder whether things don’t start on time because people are late, or because the attendees know that it won’t start on time."
title: Ghana: GMT means Ghana Man Time!

sentence: Do you know Ghana Time?: "Jokes abound about lateness – GMT stands for Ghana Man Time – and there is an assumption that nothing will ever start on time.
And yet sometimes I wonder whether things don’t start on time because people are late, or because the attendees know that it won’t start on time."
